mapper.select: SELECT CI.CART_ITEM_ID, CI.PRODUCT_ID, CI.PRODUCT_OPTION, CI.PRICE, CI.QUANTITY, CI.SUB_TOTAL , P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.COST_PRICE FROM CART_ITEMS CI INNER JOIN PRODUCTS P ON CI.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND CI.CART_ID = #{cartId} AND CI.IS_CHECKED = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(CART_ITEM_ID) AS ITEM_CNT, SUM(SUB_TOTAL) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM CART_ITEMS WHERE 1=1 AND CART_ID = #{cartId} AND IS_CHECKED = 'Y'
SELECT M.USER_NAME, M.PHONE_NUMBER , G.GRADE_CODE, G.DISCOUNT_RATE FROM MEMBERS M INNER JOIN GRADES G ON M.GRADE_CODE = G.GRADE_CODE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS (ORDER_NUMBER, PHONE_NUMBER, TOTAL_AMOUNT, DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, FINAL_AMOUNT, USER_NAME, SHIPPING_POST, SHIPPING_ADDR_1, SHIPPING_ADDR_2, MEMBER_ID, SHIPPING_COMMENT, PAYMENT_METHOD) VALUES( #{orderNumber}, #{phoneNumber}, #{totalAmount}, #{discountAmount}, #{finalAmount}, #{receiver}, #{shippingPost}, #{shippingAddr1}, #{shippingAddr2}, #{memberId}, #{shippingComment}, #{paymentMethod} )

INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEMS (ORDER_ID ,PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_OPTION, PRICE, QUANTITY, SUB_TOTAL, COST_PRICE) VALUES( #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productOption}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{subTotal}, #{costPrice} )
INSERT INTO POINTS (MEMBER_ID, CHANGE_TYPE, POINT, DESCRIPTION, ORDER_ID) VALUES ( #{memberId}, '사용', -#{usedPoint}, '주문 결제 시 사용', #{orderId} )
